ai_sprite.name: woman3
ai_sprite.dialog: This is the land known as Siron. Surely you have heard of us? We are able to tend to any weary traveler.

dialog.text: Corianton? I last saw him over in the garden.
So, the Anti Nephi Lehies settled in Jershon. That's nice. I'm glad they're safe.
No, we cannot provide any land to your Lamanite refugees. Have you checked at Manti or Antionum to the northeast?

ai_sprite.name: woman5
ai_sprite.dialog: Don't listen to anyone. They're harlots, the lot of them, and they'll leave you nothing but shame and empty pockets.

ai_sprite.name: woman6
ai_sprite.dialog: Ooh, an entire army of strong, handsome men!

dialog.text: Oh, Corianton! You're the only one I will ever love! ...if you pay up of course.
Hey there, I'm Isabel. If you meet a young man named Corianton, can you tell him to meet me back here?

ai_sprite.name: corianton
ai_sprite.dialog: I am sorry I deserted you on the battlefield. My pride and the lure of Isabel have left me without integrity. It is all I can do now to repent and commit my life to teaching others to not make the same mistakes I did.
